New Records: Jordan Poole becomes the 1st player in WAS history to have 5+ 3PM in 5 straight games
Key Match Events: Carlton Carrington scored 11 points and made all three of his 3-point attempts
Kyshawn George buried a 3-pointer to stretch the Wizards’ lead to 16 points
George pushed Washington’s lead to 20 points on a dunk
Chicago outrebounded Washington 44-42 but turned the ball over 20 times on the way to being outscored 33-11 in points off turnovers
Miscellaneous Highlights: Washington shot 49.5 percent (49 of 99) from the field, making 17 of 36 attempts from 3-point range (47.2 percent)
Chicago made 41 of its 92 attempts from the field (44.6 percent) and shot 29.8 percent (14 of 47) from 3-point range
Others: Jordan Poole scored 30 points to lead the host Washington Wizards to a 125-107 win over the Chicago Bulls
Washington led by as many as 12 points in the second quarter
Poole made his return to the Wizards lineup after missing the two previous games with a hip injury
